channel.title: Help
channel.description:
I Started my server off on MythScape i've added full comabt but i still get two "glitches"
The First is that on my wep interface every weapon has this weapon -2
How do i change that beacuse i've search through Client and found nothing
Second is that all the weapon bonuses are 120... When i am unarmed it still has all the bonues 120
anyhelp will be helpful :)

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @Cyp_import10 Cyp_import10
item.description:
@Cyp_import10 wrote:

Try looking through player notepad.

Read full topic
